data.name: String1
data.value: Privacy Policy

data.name: String10
data.value: The purposes of the processing of personal data are, in particular:

data.name: String11
data.value: The Service collects the following information about Users:

data.name: String12
data.value: Displays or otherwise discloses personal information entered by the User to the Administration while using the Service. Such information, in a special case (but not limited to), is the username and last name, e-mail address and password, phone number, location of the User, as well as address. If the User logs in through a social network profile, the Service will also use such a social network may collect information posted on your profile. The User is responsible for the information provided to him, while the Service provides a channel for the dissemination and publication of User information on the Internet.

data.name: String13
data.value: The service also includes information on the Administration, racial or ethnic origin, political, religious and ideological backgrounds, membership in political parties and trade unions, criminal convictions, nor does it collect or process information related to health, sexuality, biometric or genetic information.

data.name: String14
data.value: Service and Administration No personal or other information provided by Users to third parties not related to the Service, except as permitted by the User. as well as in cases stipulated by the User Agreement or legislation.

data.name: String15
data.value: You must contact us to delete personal information about the user.

data.name: String16
data.value: Cookies, web beacons, and similar technologies

data.name: String17
data.value: The service may use cookies, web beacons and other similar technologies to store information. These files facilitate the use of the website and its attachments It is used for the purpose of improving the quality of services (as well as security), as well as for advertising purposes.

data.name: String18
data.value: The Administration takes all necessary security measures to prevent unauthorized access to cookies and similar technologies. The user undertakes to take similar security measures. The Administration guarantees that only authorized Administration and / or Service Providers have access to cookies.

data.name: String19
data.value: Service providers are companies that help with various aspects of the Service. Administration Provision of the relevant services of the Service to the User, as well as directly to the Service uses some authorized service providers for other purposes related to its activities. Such service providers also use cookies (external cookies) to store cookies on the User's device. can place. They may also collect other information, such as an IP address or other identifiers.

data.name: String2
data.value: Privacy Policy

data.name: String20
data.value: Any information collected and stored by the Service using the above technologies is used with the permission of the User.

data.name: String21
data.value: Making changes to the privacy policy

data.name: String22
data.value: The Administration may modify, delete or update the Privacy Policy.

data.name: String23
data.value: If the User does not agree with the changes, he / she must stop using the Service. If the User continues to use the Service, he agrees and agrees to all changes and Privacy adopts the new version of the policy as a whole.

data.name: String3
data.value: The current Privacy Policy is an integral part of the turbo.az Service User Agreement.

data.name: String4
data.value: This Privacy Policy sets out the procedures for obtaining, storing, processing, using, disclosing and protecting the User's personal information.

data.name: String5
data.value: The personal database of users is located at the address of the Administration.

data.name: String6
data.value: The Administrator of the Personal Database is the Administration - DIGITAL CLASSIFIEDS LLC.

data.name: String7
data.value: When filling out the form for publication of the announcement or during the registration of the User in the Service, or when subscribing to shipments, as well as in other cases of using the Service, the User Provides information and personal information to the administration. Data collection can also be done through surveys of Service Users. Participate in user surveys Users carried out with permission.

data.name: String8
data.value: The User makes a free and voluntary decision to provide the Service with personal information and any other information, as well as personal data and information. Consents to the processing by the Administration and their transfer to other Users and / or third parties acting on behalf of the Administration for processing.

data.name: String9
data.value: The processing of personal data is the aggregation of any action or action, such as collection, registration, collection, storage, adaptation, modification, update, use and dissemination (dissemination, realization, transmission, as well as abroad) and the destruction of personal data, as well as the use of information (automated) systems.
